text: Quentin Tarantino has apologized to Samantha Geimer after suggesting that she wanted to have sex with Roman Polanski when she was 13. In a resurfaced 2003 interview with Howard Stern, Tarantino said Geimer “ wanted to have it and dated the guy. ” He also called Geimer a “ party girl ” and said that sex with a minor doesn ’ t rise to the level of rape. Facing an online backlash, Tarantino has changed his position and called his remarks “ cavalier. ” “ Fifteen years later, I realize how wrong I was, ” Tarantino said. “ Ms. Geimer WAS raped by Roman Polanski. ” In an interview with the Daily News, Geimer said, “ I ’ m not upset, but I would probably feel better
